settings.title: Will I Receive A Quality Product By KALKI Fashion?
settings.infos: As an international brand, we adhere to strict quality and design benchmarks. Every KALKI product goes through a 5 step Quality Control process to ensure that you receive the best.

settings.title: I'm Not Able To Place My Order
settings.infos:
We're sorry you're facing hiccups while placing an order, we'd hate to inconvenience you further. So here are some options:

Call us on:

(India) +91 22-489-00416

(US) +1 (408) 520-9415

(UK) +44 (203) 287-9415

(AUS) +61 (280) 069-415

Whatsapp us: +919920012474

Email Us At: info@kalkifashion.com
Live Chat with us through our Website : https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=919920012474

Our team will resolve your issues swiftly.

settings.title: Can I Place An Order For A Sold-Out Style?
settings.infos: For Sold-Out styles, if you're registered with us, add them to your Wishlist. Do submit your email address, so we can notify you once these styles are back in stock. If not, contact our Customer Support Team with the product SKU code via Email, Phone Call, Chat or Whatsapp. We will check and let you know, if and when we should receive these styles again. Or, if these can be tailored for you.

settings.title: I Want To Reschedule My Delivery/Pick-Up
settings.infos:
Delayed in traffic? Held up in a meeting - We know these things happen. If you want to reschedule pick up, please drop a mail toinfo@kalkifashion.comwith the following details and we will make it happen:

Your order#

The time of pick up

Email address and phone number

Or you can call DHL Customer Service Number Toll Free Number - 1800 11 1345 with the tracking details recieved in your Order Email id.

settings.title: My Delivery/Pick-Up Has Not Arrived
settings.infos:
We're sorry to hear that! In case your pick up has not arrived at the scheduled hour. Please drop a mail to info@kalkifashion.com with your Order# & our team will get back to you regarding the status or reschedule a convenient time for you

Or you can call DHL Customer Service Number Toll Free Number - 1800 11 1345 with the tracking details received in your Order Email id.

settings.title: I Am Happy With Your Service, Where Do I Leave My Review?
settings.infos:
Share on our facebook page click here: https://www.facebook.com/pg/kalkifashion/reviews/

settings.title: Who Do I Contact If I Face Any Payment Issues?
settings.infos:

(AUS) +61 (280) 069-415

24/7 or email us at : info@kalkifashion.com for quick chat now even you can whatsapp us at +919920012474
